original_text: The north side of the yard was also 45 metres long. It also had 20 poles and their bronze bases, as well as their silver hooks and sticks.
korean_text: 그 북쪽에도 백 규빗이라 그 기둥이 스물이며 그 받침이 스물이니 놋이요 기둥의 갈고리와 가름대는 은이며

sentences.original_text: The north side of the yard was also 45 metres long
It also had 20 poles and their bronze bases
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 또한 20개의 기둥과 그들의 청동 받침이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: as well as their silver hooks and sticks
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 은 갈고리와 막대기도 있었습니다
